doItems: Come with a completely clean face â€” no makeup, no mascara, no eye cream.
Wash your lashes the night before and the morning of the appointment.
Eat something before you come so you're comfortable lying down.
Arrive a little early so you're relaxed and not rushing.
Use the bathroom before your appointment starts.
Keep your phone on silent during the session.
Tell me if you've used lash serums, eye drops, or any intense skincare recently.
Remove contact lenses before the appointment.
Stay fragrance-free (no strong perfume, sprays, or scented oils).
Keep your eyes moisturized the day before, but avoid creams directly on the lash line.
dontItems: Don't use retinol, acids (AHAs/BHAs), or exfoliants around the eyes for 48 hours.
Don't apply mascara â€” especially waterproof â€” for 72 hours before.
Don't use heavy oils, Vaseline, or oily skincare on your face or around your eyes.
Don't curl your lashes with a lash curler for 48 hours.
Don't drink caffeine or stimulants at least 3 hours before â€” it makes your eyes flutter.
Don't wear contact lenses during the appointment.
Don't arrive with tears, sweat, or wet lashes (crying, shower, gym).
Don't apply sunscreen on the eyelids or lash line before your appointment.
Don't chew gum during the session â€” it moves your eyes.
Don't rush in stressed or overheated â€” it affects retention.
